column4: In my crontab, can i 'cd' to a directory before a command is ran? i have that as an entry before a command that requires it be ran from that location, and it doesn't seem to be working
instead of using cd, you could just directly put the full path to the executable file
I'm using the full path, but an extra parameter (the 'sub command name')  isn't recognized unless im actually in that directory
